text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Tocopilla | official_name = | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = City and Commune | image_skyline = Tocopilla-Puerto.jpg | image_alt = Port of Tocopilla | image_caption = Port of Tocopilla | nickname = | image_seal = Escudo de Tocopilla.svg | motto = | image_map = Comuna de Tocopilla.svg | mapsize = | map_alt = Map of Tocopilla commune in Antofagasta Region | map_caption = The Tocopilla commune in Antofagasta Region | pushpin_map = Chile | pushpin_map_narrow = yes | pushpin_mapsize = | pushpin_label_position = bottom | pushpin_map_caption = Location in Chile |coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Region | subdivision_name1 = Antofagasta | subdivision_type2 = Province | subdivision_name2 = Tocopilla | parts_type = | parts_style = | parts = | p1 = | p2 = | established_title = Founded | established_date = 1843 | seat_type = | seat = | government_footnotes = | government_type = Municipal council | leader_party = | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Fernando San Román Bascuñán | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 4038.8 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 154 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 23986 | population_as_of = 2002 Census | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = Tocopillian | population_blank1_title = | population_blank1 = | demographics_type1 = | demographics1_footnotes = | demographics1_title1 = | demographics1_info1 = | timezone = CLT | utc_offset = -4 | timezone_DST = CLST | utc_offset_DST = -3 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = 56 + 552 | blank_name = Climate | blank_info = BWn | website = Official website | footnotes = }} Tocopilla is a city and commune in the Antofagasta region in the north of Chile. It is the capital of the province of Tocopilla. ==Geography== The commune of Tocopilla has an area of . The commune is bordered on the north by the Tarapacá region, on the east by the María Elena commune, on the south by the Antofagasta province and on the west by the Pacific Ocean. ==Population== (last national census), there were 23,986 people living in the commune, giving it a population density of inhabitants/km². The inhabitants of Tocopilla are known as Tocopillian; in Spanish, tocopillano for men andTocopillana for women. ==References== ==Other websites== * Territorial division of Chile * Gobierno Regional de Antofagasta * Province of Tocopilla website * Municipalidad de Tocopilla website Category:Cities in Chile Category:Antofagasta Region
title: Tocopilla
